tooltip.text:
Super Administrator - All administrator rights to view or order fuel, edit all company users, registered aircraft and financial information.
Administrator - Administrator rights to view or order fuel for specific aircraft and associated financial information.
Basic - Rights to view or order fuel and view transaction history.

aviationFactsList.fact: Approximately 33% of the business jet have been in operation for over 10 years
The world's fastest private jet has a top speed of Mach 0.94
Some private jets have an operating ceiling of 51,000 feet
